identificationModule.briefTitle: Measurement of Cerebral Oxygen Extraction Fraction Using MRI Technique

descriptionModule.briefSummary: All images in this study were acquired on a 1.5 T Sonata whole body scanner (Siemens Medical Inc., Erlangen, Germany) using 2D multi-echo gradient echo/spin echo sequence and 2D single-shot gradient echo-planar imaging sequence plus intravenous magnetic susceptibility contrast medium. The quantitative estimates and mapping of cerebral metabolic rate of oxygen utilization were calculated and plotted in all subjects.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: All images in this study were acquired on a 1.5 T Sonata whole body scanner (Siemens Medical Inc., Erlangen, Germany) using 2D multi-echo gradient echo/spin echo sequence and 2D single-shot gradient echo-planar imaging sequence plus intravenous magnetic susceptibility contrast medium. The quantitative estimates and mapping of cerebral metabolic rate of oxygen utilization were calculated and plotted in all subjects.

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* normal volunteer
* stroke

Exclusion Criteria:

* who is unable receiving MRI examination
* pregnancy
